Software name:                           LZMA Decoder
Brief:                                   LZMA provides a high compression ratio and fast decompression, so it is very suitable for embedded applications. For example, it can be used for ROM (firmware) compressing.
Path:                                    mcu\middleware\third_party\lzma_decoder
Category:                                Open source software(OSS)
Path:                                    /mcu/middleware/third_party/lzma_decoder
Software maker:                          Igor Pavlov
OSS download link:                       https://www.7-zip.org/sdk.html
License:                                 public domain
Evidence of license agreement:           https://www.7-zip.org/sdk.html
Version:                                 21.02
